Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Very small and dark bar close to the museum area but in a tiny and hidden away street. Their beer selection is great, both in terms of variety and quality, including some relatively more rare and less know beers. The staff was very ‚Ä¶

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Incredible variety of craft beer on tap and in bottles. Knowledgeable and friendly staff who can suggest anything based on your preference. Ill definitely be back!

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Very cosy, good music and a lot of tasty beers.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: A worn down and dirty brown caf√© that is absolutly lovely. Found down a narrow street from the Leidse plein. They have a great selection of beer on tap and bottle served by the nicest guy.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Very good selection of beers and a very friendly staff. Music choice was perfect (they had Rodriguez playing when we arrived) and volume was just high enough to listen to, just low enough to talk effortlessly with my friend. A perfect experience.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Great bar, a little off the beaten path so not packed with tourists.  Beer selection is awesome. You can get the coveted Westvleeteren or just ask the bar tender for a recommendation and you will have many choices from traditional Belgian Trappist to new Dutch craft brews.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: the bar is perfect to enjoy a few beers in the center, the friendly and hardworking waiter,

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: A huge variety of beers and very nice waiters.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Very cozy place with a great amount of options on beers.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Best beer selection it the city. Easy recommend!

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Lovely, cozy beer bar with a great selection and friendly staff!

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Great selection of beers and nice atmosphere

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Nice place to sit down with your friends and enjoy different types of beers

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Best chicken themed restaurant in Europe, perhaps in all the world. Come for the beer, stay for the people!

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Really cool old pub a few minutes walk from Leidseplein that has a very large selection of beers. The staff is always friendly and the space is cool and dark. There are very few food options here besides bar bites but that is also part of the charm. Ask about the cellar beer specials, always a surprise and reasonably priced.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: A rare site in otherwise tourist-trap filled corner of the city: good beer bar. Always a solid selection of drafts, mostly coming from A'dam breweries as well as extended set of bottles from all over the place. It's a fantastic place for a good evening of card games and hoppy drinks.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Nice small place with a lot of specialty beer, one of my favourite spots in Amsterdam!

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Huge selection of beers and other beverages such as whisky for such a small caf√©. Not too crowded and the music is better than most bars. Very friendly staff that isn't afraid of small talk. Overall a very chill place to spend a night.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: One of my favorite bars I've visited here in Amsterdam. They offer a wide selection of alcoholic drinks including stouts, ipa's, blondes, doubles, triples, and even some quadruples. They have a selection of wine and ciders as well and a knowledgeable bar staff to boot.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: friendly and home-like atmosphere, good choice of beer

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: I would pretty much echo the other few reviews already posted.  Great beer selection and very friendly, helpful bartenders who really know their stuff.  And though it is not a huge place (a good thing), there is usually some space available at one of the tables.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: lovely 'hidden' cafe near Leidseplein, but mostly locals and tourists that want to escape from the usual tourist attractions. So many nice (craft) beers to choose from and a good atmosphere (can also vouch for the cheese tosti!). celebrated my birthday here last year in summer :)

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Excellent draft and bottle selection. Bartenders are well informed and willing to go the extra mile. If you want a chill place to drink in the evening, it's a great suggestion.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Quaint place, vintage vibe, great beer selection

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Cozy friendly place. Great atmosphere and a good variety of beer. Highly recommend

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Lovely vibe and chill wait staff. The street is a quiet haven for people watching. The tuna melt is served panini style and is served with a dark sweet sauce, but it's great with the sweet chili sauce.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Very nice cozy bar, centrally located close to Leidseplein. Amazing beer selection and friendly staff. A must if you are a beer lover!

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: One of my favorite bars in town! Great selection of beers and very nice staff.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: A hidden gem in the heart of Amsterdam near the Leidseplein where you can have a nice conversation without being interrupted. ‚Ä¶

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Great selection of beers. Friendly staff and cozy atmosphere. Nothing more can be asked to have a great time with friends or even alone at the bar, enjoying a good drink

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: One of the best selection of beer in Amsterdam. We went twice during our trip - and could have gone every day. I found some rare and hard to find beers here.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: A small off the beaten path gem for some top notch craft and draught beer selections, I had the Jopen IPA off draught and a bottled oak aged St Bernadus abt 12... Simply delicious stuff here and all at not too shabby prices either.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Great local pub, good beers and excellent service by Ren√© ! We will come back for sure during our next visit.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Great selection of beers, sorted by style on a big chalkboard. The interior is warm and dark and the bar staff are incredibly friendly.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Amazing bartenders: friendly and knowledgeable. Great selection of beer (over 100 varieties including Westvleteren 12). Perfect environment.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: A very special little bar that has everything going for it. Cosy, interesting and gorgeous staff with all the beer varieties that you could want.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text:
Super vibe at the Spuyt!

Very cosy and authentic pub with a great selection of beer and music! ‚Ä¶

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Great hidden gem near Leidseplein. Fabian and his staff have the knowledge and extensive menu for a great time. A must see for beer/alcohol enthusiasts!

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Our 'local' on our visit to Amsterdam.   Good choice of beers on tap and many bottled beers. Very friendly & helpful bar-staff

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: The absolute #1 place to meet both foreign and local people, that enjoy a good tasty drink. Very sweet selection of beer and wine!

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Great beer bar, a lot of choices & friendly staff. Had the cheese & bread to snack on with a Rodenbach Grand Cru, couldn't have been happier.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Best bar in the neighbourhood. Good selection of beers and very friendly staff!:)

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Great beer cafe just next to Leidseplein. Good options on draft and many bottles. It's small, but they have a few tables outside

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Very nice selection of beer and other things. Nice ambience. Local crowd. A bit to the pricy side in my opionion.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Great local bar on a lively street in Amsterdam. Highly recommended if you're looking for a lower key drink amongst the craziness.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Cozy little spot with an exhaustive beer menu and light snacks. Great atmosphere.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Fine selection of beers. Mainly Dutch and Belgian, but also some international brews. Prices are decent.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Excellent little bar with a great range of beers. Well worth seeing out.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Tiny intimate bar with an insane collection of beers and ciders. Also their livingroom style concerts are very nice.

Name: De Spuyt
Review Text: Cosy environment with friendly staff. Not too expensive compared to other bars that have the same amount of variety in beer options.

Name: De Spuyt
